description:
This is an excellent piece of software. It's also a great FOSS alternative to Sublime Text.
 
Love it.
as developers have stopped working on Atom.io this fork is the next best thing, may not have every plugin but it works well.

Since Atom, this has been my go to text editor. While I always have multiple installed I enjoy working in Atom the most. It is simple and, for my use cases, it is much simpler to switch between multiple contexts.

We are lucky that people stepped up to keep Atom alive under a new name.

I always loved atom but because of Atom sunset a lot of people have abandoned Atom/Pulsar. Hopefully people that miss Atom will come back when they reealize that an amazing team is working on Pulsar and is being developed at an incredible pace.

Hopefully the developers that made packages for Atom will keep them updated as people are still using them.
I have always missed atom since its slow death. i can't tell you how happy I am to see this project.
